Kimi Ga Nozumu Ien:: Its amazing. short briefing with 3 words.. heartbreaking, Joy and anger..? I showed this for my girlfriend wich first thought i was childish watching cartoon anime (21 yrs old) She saw the 3 first episodes and she was stuck.. ended watching it whole til 4 in the morning (she even cried and got angry and felt happiness, so did i) I recomend this serie.. seen around 200 gig animes.. series and movies this one is one of my top 10. No shame to cry when watching it... enjoy! PS:: YES its a norm anime, not some Hentai crap even if there are some love sceens.
